about_the_game:
Concluse 2 is an atmospheric horror game which places an emphasis on puzzles, combat, cutscenes, and exploration of a twisted reality. It features numerous mechanics not seen in the first game.

Story

Play once again as Michael Benson, a man searching for his missing wife who has been spotted in the strangely named town of Hell. After having made your way through Cordova, you have finally made it to your destination. After 3 years of searching, you're the closest to finding Carolyn that you've ever been. You'll start your journey as you arrive outside of the Edison Hotel where you'll confront its many denizens while also having to confront your past. Hell awaits..

The Drifting Prefecture

Eventually during you're journey you'll stumble into the Japanese inspired Drifting Prefecture where the game itself will evolve. Experience the nested story of the Itawa clan and how Concluse has infected this realm of demons which exists besides our own. Face off with all new enemies and bosses across the Prefecture's six floors as you aid in clearing the infection.

Features

  • PSX inspired graphics keep the game true to its lost origins
  • Free PS1-style Strategy Guide included
  • Play your way with customizable difficulty
  • Unique puzzles to uncover hidden secrets and new areas
  • 40+ original music tracks
  • 2+ hours of in-game cutscenes
  • 70+ enemies spanning more than 40 unique areas
  • 10+ unique boss fights
  • Much more..

Voice Roster

Jared Raman, Francesca Calo, Leader Looi, Crystal Lee, Chris Okawa, Rachel Lee, Brock F Powell, Brook Chalmers, Sean Chiplock, Rebecca Uesugi, Julie Cleburn, Nicole Gose, and Evan Tran.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence and material that is more appropriate for mature audiences.
